Kristen Mary Jenner ( née Houghton / HOH - tən HOH bụbu Kardashian ; amuru Nọvemba 5, 1955)  bụ agwa mgbasa ozi America, onye na-elekọta mmadụ, na nwanyị ọchụnta ego
O tolitere bụrụ onye ama ama n'ịgba egwu na usoro ihe onyonyo n'ezie na-edobe na Kardashians (2007 – 2021).

O nwere ụmụ anọ site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya na onye ọka iwu Robert Kardashian : Kourtney, Kim, Khloé na Robert, na ụmụ abụọ site na alụmdi na nwunye nke abụọ ya na àgwà telivishọn na onye meriri egwuregwu Olympic Bruce Jenner (nke bụ Caitlyn): Kendall na Kylie

A mụrụ Jenner na San Diego, California, na Nọvemba 5, 1955, ọkpara n'ime ụmụaka abụọ a mụrụ Mary Jo "MJ" Shannon (née Campbell; mụrụ 1934), onye nwere ụlọ ahịa akwa ụmụaka, na Robert True "Bob" Houghton
(1931–1975), onye injinia
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, M. J
na Bob gbara alụkwaghịm, ma ya na nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere, Karen Casey (née Houghton; a mụrụ 1958), bụ ndị nne ha zụlitere
MJ ga-emecha lụọkwa ọzọ, nye onye ọchụnta ego Harry Shannon (1926–2003), onye nyere aka zụlite ya na Karen
Site n'alụmdi na nwunye nne ya na Harry, ọ nwetara nwanne, Steven "Steve" Shannon
Ọnwa atọ ka ọ kwagara Oxnard, California, onye ọrụ azụmahịa Shannon boro ebubo na ọ hapụrụ isi obodo ụlọ ọrụ ahụ niile, ya mere ezinụlọ ahụ laghachiri na San Diego
Na San Diego, Jenner rụrụ ọrụ na Shannon & Company, ụlọ ahịa akwa ụmụaka nke nne ya nwere
Jenner gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Clairemont  wee gụchaa na 1973
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka American ụgbọ elu dị ka onye na-eje ozi ụgbọ elu otu afọ na 1976
Jenner na-arụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, Jenner Communications, nke dabeere na Los Angeles
Ebe ọ bụ na tupu mmalite nke Ịnọgide na-enwe na Kardashians, ọ na-ejikwa ụmụ ya nwanyị Kim, Kourtney, Khloe, Kendall, na ọrụ Kylie
Ọ na-etinyekwa aka na njikwa azụmahịa nke ụmụ ya ndị nwanyị ndị ọzọ na nwa nwoke.
Jenner mepere ụlọ ahịa ụmụaka na 2004 ya na ada ya nwanyị, Kourtney
A na-akpọ boutique ahụ "Smooch" ma meghere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ isii tupu emechie ya na 2009
Na 2011, Jenner ulo oru a uwe ahịrị, Kris Jenner Kollection na QVC
Jenner ejirila QVC rere ngwa mgbatị ahụ na 1990s
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ Jenner, Kris Jenner..
na All Things Kardashian, wepụtara na Nọvemba 2011
O mechara dee akwụkwọ esi nri akpọrọ In the Kitchen with Kris: A Kollection of Kardashian-Jenner Family Favorites, nke ewepụtara na October 2014
Jenner kwadoro ihe ngosi okwu ụbọchị nke omenala pop, Kris
Usoro ahụ malitere ịgba ọsọ n'oge okpomọkụ izu isii ya n'ọtụtụ ọdụ Fox nwere na Julaị 15, 2013
Kanye West, ọgọ ya nwoke, kpughere foto ọha mbụ nke nwa nwanyị North West na ihe ngosi ahụ
Agbatịghị ọsọ nnwale nke ihe ngosi ahụ nke were izu isii
Jenner zutere Ryan Seacrest na 2007 ịchụso ihe ngosi telivishọn n'ezie dabere na ezinụlọ ya
Seacrest, bụ onye nwere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, kpebiri ịzụlite echiche ahụ, na-enwe ihe ngosi ezinụlọ a ma ama The Osbournes n'uche ya
Jenner gara n'ihu kwuo okwu banyere usoro enwere ike:
Emechara welitere ihe nkiri a ka ọ pụta na E! USB netwọk na Jenner na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe
Usoro a na-elekwasị anya na ndụ onwe onye na nke ọkachamara nke ezinụlọ agwakọtara Kardashian–Jenner
Usoro a malitere na Ọktoba 14, 2007, wee bụrụ otu n'ime ihe ngosi telivishọn na-eme ogologo oge na mba ahụ
Oge nke iri na asatọ nke Idogide ndị Kardashians malitere ikuku na Maachị 26, 2020
Ihe ngosi a rụpụtara na mmepe nke ọtụtụ ntụgharị, dị ka Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami (2009), Kourtney and Kim Take New York (2011), Khloé & Lamar (2011), Rob & Chyna (2016), na Ndụ nke Kylie (2017)
Na Disemba 31, 2021, ekwuputara na Jenner na ezinụlọ ya ga-apụta na usoro ọhụrụ na Hulu akpọrọ The Kardashians
A na-ahazi ya ka ọ ga-ekuku ma emechaa na 2022
A na-akpọkarị Jenner dị ka onye na-achị ezinụlọ

Dimitri Ehrlich nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Interview kpọrọ ya "nna nke Kardashian-Jenner brood" na "ndị na-emepụta omenala omenala ndị inyom na narị afọ nke 21st."  Jenner kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka nwanyị ọchụnta ego n'ihe ndekọ ya Kris Jenner
Na ihe niile Kardashian: “Amalitere m ile ọrụ anyị anya dị ka iberibe chessboard
Kwa ụbọchị, m na-eteta ụra ma banye n'ọfis m ma jụọ onwe m, sị, 'Olee ịkwaga i kwesịrị ime taa?' A gbakọrọ ya nke ukwuu
Mkpebi azụmahịa na atụmatụ m bụ nke ebum n'obi, nke doro anya na atụmatụ ya ruo ogo nth."
E gosipụtara Jenner na mkpuchi nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji, gụnyere CR Fashion Book,  Redbook, Cosmopolitan, Harper's Bazaar,  The Hollywood Reporter, Es Magazine, na New Gị
Alụmdi na nwunye mbụ Jenner bụ onye ọka iwu Robert Kardashian (onye mechara bụrụ onye ama ama maka nnọchite iwu mbụ ya nke OJ Simpson ) na Julaị 8, 1978
Ha nwere ụmụ anọ: ụmụ nwanyị Kourtney (amụrụ 1979), Kim (amụrụ 1980), Khloé (amụrụ 1984), na nwa Rob (a mụrụ 1987)
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm na Maachị 1991, mana ọ bụ ezigbo enyi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa cancer esophageal na 2003
Na 2012, Kris kwupụtara na ya na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ na animator Todd Waterman nwere mmekọrịta n'oge alụmdi na nwunye ya na Kardashian
Ọ kpọrọ Waterman dị ka "Ryan" na akụkọ ndụ ya, mana o gosipụtara onwe ya n'onwe ya
Ha nwere nzuko na Idogide ndị Kardashians mgbe Kris na-enwe nkuzi tenis

N'April 1991, otu ọnwa mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ya na Kardashian gasịrị, Jenner lụrụ di na nwunye nke abụọ, Olympian Bruce Jenner lara ezumike nká, bụ onye pụtara n'ihu ọha dị ka nwanyị transgender na 2015, na-akpọ aha Caitlyn
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ọnụ: Kendall (amụrụ 1995) na Kylie (amụrụ 1997);  na akụkọ ndụ ya, Jenner kọwara na ọ kpọrọ nwa ya nwanyị Kendall Nicole aha mgbe Nicole Brown Simpson nwụrụ
Site n'alụmdi na nwunye na Bruce, Kris nwekwara ụmụ nwanyị anọ: Burt, Cassandra "Casey", Brandon, na Brody
Ndị Jenners kwupụtara nkewa ha na Ọktoba 2013,   na na Septemba 22, 2014, Kris gbara akwụkwọ maka ịgba alụkwaghịm, na-ekwu maka esemokwu na-enweghị nkwekọrịta
Ịgba alụkwaghịm ahụ mechara bụrụ na Maachị 23, 2015, n'ihi iwu steeti chọrọ ọnwa isii

Kris Jenner ekwuola maka nbika ya na Caitlyn dị ka "ihe na-adịghị mma na-eme ihe ike", na-ekwu na mgbe Kris maara maka ojiji nke Caitlyn na-eji hormones na 1980s, "enweghị okwu gbasara nwoke na nwanyị
Ọ dịghị onye kwuru okwu gbasara nwoke na nwanyị."  Jenner nwere ụmụ ụmụ iri
Jenner na Corey Gamble na-enwe mmekọrịta kemgbe gburugburu 2014

Jenner na ezinụlọ ya nwere ọgbaghara mmetụta uche n'oge ikpe OJ Simpson (1994-1995), emesịkwara kọwaa dị ka "Ọnwụnwa nke Century." Jenner bụ ezigbo enyi nke nwunye mbụ OJ, Nicole Brown, na di mbụ Jenner, Robert Kardashian, bụ otu n'ime OJ Simpson's " Dream Team " nke ndị ọka iwu agbachitere n'oge ikpe ahụ
Onye omere America bụ Selma Blair gosipụtara ya na usoro FX amachi akụkọ American Crime Story: The People v
OJ Simpson, nke ewepụtara na February 2016
Jenner na pastọ Brad Johnson tọrọ ntọala California Community Church na 2012
Akpọrọ ya na mbụ Life Change Community Church, nke dị na Agoura Hills, California
